description:
Green Works Multi-Surface Cleaner combines powerful cleaning performance with naturally derived and plant based ingredients to safely tackle messes throughout your home. This all purpose spray cleaner cuts through grease, grime and dirt with ease without any harsh chemical fumes or residue. It is safe to use on multiple surfaces including counters, appliances, stainless steel, sealed granite, chrome, sinks and toilets. Green Works Multi-Surface Cleaner Spray is tough enough on your worst messes. Stains immediately start to dissolve upon spraying, making it the perfect cleaner for bathrooms and kitchens. The Smart Tube technology bottle lets you spray this product down to the last drop. With Green Works naturally derived cleaning products, you get powerful cleaning done naturally.

Usage Directions: Turn nozzle to ON position. Spray the soiled surface with cleaner and wipe with a paper towel or cloth. For any surfaces about which you are unsure, test on a small, inconspicuous area. For heavy soiled areas, repeat as necessary. Tilt bottle at downward angle while spraying to spray every drop.

Caution Statements: Keep out of reach of children.

description:

This bleach has the cleaning power you need naturally without chlorine or optical brighteners and leaves your laundry looking clean and bright and smelling fresh. It is safe for plumbing and septic systems and can be used on both traditional and HE washers. With Green Works naturally derived cleaning products, you get powerful cleaning done naturally.

Usage Directions: For best results, pretreat stains by applying this color safe bleach directly onto stains. Add up to 1/2 cup for large or heavily soiled loads.

Caution Statements: Eye irritant. Do not get laundry product in eyes. Do not ingest. Keep out of reach of children.

description:
Green Works Bathroom Cleaner Spray combines powerful cleaning performance with naturally derived and plant based ingredients to remove tough stains throughout your bathroom. Its powerful cleaners cut through soap scum, hard water stains, and rust without any harsh chemicals fumes or residue. It is safe on multiple bathroom surfaces and works great on counters, sinks, bathtubs, tiles, and shower doors. The Smart Tube technology bottle lets you spray this product down to the very last drop. With Green Works naturally derived cleaning products, you get powerful cleaning done naturally.

Usage Directions: Turn nozzle to ON. Spray the soiled surface with cleaner, allowing the product to penetrate dirt and soap scum. Wipe with a wet sponge or cloth and rinse with water if needed.

Caution Statements: Eye irritant. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children. Do not use or mix with products that contain bleach. To do so may release hazardous gases.

description:
Green Works Compostable Cleaning Wipes are made with naturally derived ingredients so they won't leave behind harsh chemical fumes or residue. The powerful advanced grease fighting formula cuts through grease, grime and dirt, while leaving behind a clean Water Lily scent. These wipes are made from natural fibers and will biodegrade under municipal composting conditions. They are safe to use on multiple surfaces throughout the home, including counters, sinks, toilets, painted wood floors and stoves. These cleaning wipes are convenient and easy to use and are perfect for use in the kitchen and bathroom. With Green Works naturally derived cleaning products, you get powerful cleaning done naturally.

Usage Directions: Pull out cleaning wipe from center of roll. The next sheet pops up automatically. Wipe surface clean. Let air dry. For highly soiled surfaces, clean excess dirt first.

Caution Statements: Keep out of reach of children. Do not use for cleaning skin, for personal cleansing or as a diaper wipe.

description:
Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day Toilet Bowl Cleaner makes the nasty job of toilet bowl cleaning more bearable. Our toilet bowl cleaner cleans and deodorizes the entire bowl without using chlorine, dyes or solvents. Essential oils and plant-derived ingredients make it effective, biodegradable and septic safe. Made in the USA.

DIRECTIONS FOR USE: Begin by flushing the toilet in order to wet the sides of the bowl. Give the bottle a good squeeze to squirt a ring of cleaner under the rim. Wait 5-10 minutes, then brush and flush. Cleans and deodorizes your entire bowl without using chlorine or solvents.

USES: Q. Is the Toilet Bowl Cleaner effective when used with hard water? A. Yes, You can use the Toilet Bowl Cleaner if you have hard water. The acidic cleaning agents in our toilet bowl cleaner are not as strong as mass-market toilet bowl cleaners that are hydrochloric acid-based. This means that you may have to use our product more often to prevent the hard water mineral deposits that develop at the water line from building up. Q. Is your Toilet Bowl Cleaner septic safe? A.
